pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Oceanographic Data // Supports the analysis of Oceanographic data, including ADCP measurements, CTD measurements, sectional data, sea-level time series, coastline files, etc. Handles dozens of specialized functions for calculating seawater properties such as potential temperature and density, as well as derived properties such as buoyancy frequency and dynamic height. Map projections are calculated using PROJ.4 functions included within the oce.
